author: James Tanner
method: Heat the oil in a wok. Add the spring onion, bird's-eye chilli, chicken and soya beans to the wok and stir fry for three minutes. Add the noodles, soy sauce and orange juice to the wok and stir fry for a further 2-3 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through. To serve, stir the sesame seeds and mint through the noodles and pile onto a plate.
ingredients: 1 tbsp vegetable oil,  1 spring onion, finely chopped,  1 bird's-eye chilli, seeds removed, finely chopped,  2 chicken mini-fillets, chopped into bite-sized pieces,  45g/1½oz frozen soya beans,  200g/7oz ready-cooked noodles ,  2 tsp soy sauce,  ½ orange, juice only,  1 tsp sesame seeds,  1 tbsp chopped fresh mint
